entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: allow updating assembly and module level attributes #75572
  • IDE0001 false positive on nullable attributes #75570
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 when using IEnumerable<ReadOnlySpan<>> as a return value #75569
  • Hot Reload fails to apply change with "Unexpected null - file EditSession.cs line 705" #75567

Closed

  • Collection expressions may result in unnecessary tail increment #74875
    17.13
  • FormattingTestBase.AssertFormatAsync ignores the 'debugMode' test validation parameter #44225
    Backlog
  • Inline parameter hints should show for type parameters #47014
    Backlog
  • Completion can be triggered in Metadata as Source and Generated Source files #47207
    Backlog
  • Metadata as Source files and source generated files let you copy the file path to the temporary file #47210
    Backlog
  • Set-up AbstractCSharpCompletionProviderTests to be able to use ReferenceAssemblies #50368
    Backlog
  • xmlDocCommentAttributeValue classification type not applied #50091
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent C# highlighting for property of anonymous type #50099
    Backlog
  • Idea: project/package level code snippet #50125
    Backlog
  • When using "Implement Interface" to generated methods, VS adds them inside #region #30512
    Backlog
  • Regex HighLighting fails with verbatim interpolated string #34748
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] Editor has variable name casing issue in ElseIf statement #48745
    Backlog
  • Sort implementer class methods in order they defined in interface #46273
    Backlog
  • Visual indicator for deprecated code #48330
    Backlog
  • Clean up solution asset serialization #49973
    Backlog
  • Complete a catch with default exception and braces #38631
    Backlog
  • Migrate RDT accesses to a free-threaded service and remove the async wireup of Open Documents #49879
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] No need for EndIf error #49558
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.EditAndContinue.BreakpointSpans.CreateSpanForConstructorDeclaration #49779
    Backlog
  • Convert switch statement to expression produces poor formatting when arguments on separate lines. #49809
    Backlog
  • Introduce local variable doesn't work for all cases #49496
    Backlog
  • Analyzer for Make Variable Constant #49675
    Backlog
  • use different hash algorithm than SHA1 in checksum for better performance #33411
    Backlog
  • Bug using "Fix all occurrences" preview dialog #49358
    Backlog
  • Add C# refactoring for invert boolean #47602
    Backlog
  • Revisit project state comparison in EnqueueProjectConfigurationChangeWorkItemAsync #41804
    Backlog
  • SyntaxEditor.RemoveNode does not remove preceeding blank lines for attribute node removal #44342
    Backlog
  • Production of error squiggles in left diff pane regressed in VS 16.7 Preview #45329
    Backlog
  • Checksum calculation depends on temporary storage #46166
    Backlog
  • 'InlineTemporaryCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error #47058
    Backlog
  • Bad refactoring -- convert to LINQ #37661
    Backlog
  • In VB.NET, add hover-over property values within With/EndWith blocks when debugging #49043
    Backlog
  • Provide Constructor Refactoring Using Tuple Syntax #49037
    Backlog
  • Support metadata items in Ctrl+T in some way #49122
    Backlog
  • Advanced members not showing in completion lists #44134
    Backlog
  • C# document viewing using regions and smart comments. #48846
    Backlog
  • Make it easy to edit refactoring option from the Editor, #48843
    Backlog
  • Configure background code analysis per severity. #48849
    Backlog
  • "Use auto property" Quick Action (when applied to whole document) does not refactor the last property when there is more than one being refactored #48890
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] Sometimes, editor doen't append missing `( )` after method names #48581
    Backlog
  • Object Intellisense Completion for Init-Only Classes #46297
    Backlog
  • A way to prevent "items from unimported namespaces" from suggesting extension methods with the "this" parameter of type "object" or extension methods from unimported namespaces not defined in this solution #48845
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] Debug Mode doesn't support With blocks #48681
    Backlog
  • Refactor a local variable to a class member/property #47796
    Backlog
  • Improve test coverage for IsMemberDeclaration method #48163
    Backlog
  • Change signature - Add parameter colorizes preview incorrectly #47986
    Backlog
  • Generating overrides doesn't add the [AllowNull] attribute on properties #47828
    Backlog
  • "Show potential fixes" is triggered by refactorings unrelated to a diagnostic #47636
    Backlog
  • Add an option to generate new class with fields #47605
    Backlog
  • Quick Action to remove namespace prefix #47595
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Generate record default GetHashCode and Equals methods #47969
    Backlog
  • Unreported unused private field #47823
    Backlog
  • Make `IDocumentationCommentSnippetService` public #48559
    Backlog
  • Improve discoverability of code refactorings #35525
    Backlog
  • Classify redefined record member declarations and implicit interface implementations #47735
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: Local variables not available in code completion when there is no space between If and "(" #46041
    Backlog
  • Analyzer for possible wrong Roslyn API usage, and improve exception #48010
    Backlog
  • Improve IntelliSense function parameter completion #48021
    Backlog
  • VS 2019: Cannot replace multi-line selection with a new line in VB.Net editor. #48065
    Backlog
  • Rule proposal: Simplify VisualBasic TryCast and DirectCast calls #48239
    Backlog
  • Button or link to show overloads of method. #46271
    Backlog
  • Round Tripping Causes SyntaxNode.IsEquivalentTo() to Fail When There Are No Changes #32737
    Backlog
  • Investigate writing an integration test for Tools Options CodeStyle page #43813
    Backlog
  • "Suppress warning" actions available but have no effect during build #44615
    Backlog
  • Populate the Catch in a try catch with appropriate Exceptions #47798
    Backlog
  • Copying property values from one object (source) to another one or more objects that may or may not be related to the source object #47809
    Backlog
  • Intellisense too quick to insert `=> throw new NotImplementedException()` #47634
    Backlog
  • CS1061 CodeFix should suggest to add using for generic extension method when non-generic method with same name present #47698
    Backlog
  • Update IntelliSense tooltips to show actual type of alias #47200
    Backlog
  • FindAllReferences doesn't find usages of GetAsyncEnumerator in await foreach #45352
    Backlog
  • Move CompilationOptions, ParseOptions serialization/deserialization to ObjectReader/ObjectWriter #45841
    Backlog
  • Exception while loading projects #46808
    Backlog
  • Harden ObjectReader/ObjectWriter against invalid data #45839
    Backlog
  • Allow Signature Help API documentation's URL to be clickable #47437
    Backlog
  • Snippets: Filter available snippets by Kind #44122
    Backlog
  • Code fix 'convert to method' can generate invalid code #47287
    Backlog
  • problem with intellisense/autocomplete in an IF statement in VB.Net #36412
    Backlog
  • a wizard to convert C# code to nullable reference types #47009
    Backlog
  • Pulling up an event to an interface should not add/reproduce the nullable annotation #40292
    Backlog
  • Feature: Containing Type column in references window might include namespaces #46535
    Backlog
  • Analyzer reports unused constructor for MEF components. #46887
    Backlog
  • Tooltip Comments #47002
    Backlog
  • Mark string as string interpolation #46425
    Backlog
  • Inadequate proposal for removing a conversion #46756
    Backlog
  • Display region name in the navigation breadcrumbs #46567
    Backlog
  • Show pattern formats in intellisense for Guid.ToString #46867
    Backlog
  • Navigate to Type / Go to Implementation for Libraries which are not part of your solution #25472
    Backlog
  • intellisense #define suggestions are nonsense #46473
    Backlog
  • Improve snippet completion experience #46842
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense: Hovering the '.' before a method presents the first overload in the method group instead of the overload actually being used #46624
    Backlog
  • Search members in Intelli Sense by summary comments #46628
    Backlog
  • Improve stack trace view with navigation and colorization #46641
    Backlog
  • Additional outlining options #46632
    Backlog
  • Interactive window does not show inline parameter name hints #46790
    Backlog
  • Generate file_header_template from comment #46705
    Backlog
  • New InvalidOperationException in Renamer.RenameSymbolAsync for VS 16.7+ #45652
    Backlog
  • 'VisualBasicAddAccessibilityModifiersCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #46513
    Backlog
  • "Pull members up to base type" should allow specifying which partial declaration to move the member to #46483
    Backlog
  • Naming rule for optional prefix #46205
    Backlog
  • Completion should not target type after cast #13682
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #75559
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused parameter #75571
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75555
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • [release/dev17.12] EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated (#75423) #75518
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prefer Cancel() rather than Commit() when rename is async. #75562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference to avoid including msbuild dependencies #75561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • When replacing CodeStyle analyzers do not provide Features analyzers fallback options #75534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: recognize field in interpolated string #75566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ClrOnly condition is not working on mono #75548
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
